section.title: JPA Security in your classpath
section.para: First you have to make sure that JPA Security appears in your classpath. We do not provide a detailed description how to do this here, since this depends heavlily on your local environment and settings.

If you want to use JPA Security within an JavaEE application server, it may treat JPA Security like a persistence provider. please refer to the manual of your application server on how to integrate a new persistence provider and integrate JPA Security like it is described there.
